UsbDevices.NOTE1: This file is created using the instructions in https://fwupd.github.io/libfwupdplugin/device-emulation.html
UsbDevices.NOTE2: Then do 'unzip emulation.zip' and rename setup.json to this filename
UsbDevices.NOTE3: You can delete this file if you have a emulation-url specified in the {{vendor}}-{{example}}.json file!
